original_text: The man Elkanah and all his house went up to offer to the Lord the yearly sacrifice and to pay his vow.
korean_text: 그 사람 엘가나와 그의 온 집이 여호와께 매년제와 서원제를 드리러 올라갈 때에

sentences.original_text: The man Elkanah and all his house went up
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람 엘가나와 그의 온 집안이 올라가서

sentences.original_text: to offer to the Lord the yearly sacrifice
